column4: hi, i just upgraded from 11.10 to 12.04 on a machine and it will no longer boot. i get to the grub screen and if i choose the default kernel i get nothing but a blinking cursor.

if i choose recovery mode, i see kernel messages that stop after less than a second. it says something like "VFS Cannot open root device sda1" and then about ten more lines "kernel panic - not syncing"
VFS unable to mount root file system on unknown block
try to install it again. And be sure that the GRUB is installed correctly.
